logic_summary: Updated problem_summary.onset to specify 'left hemisphere' TIA as per Figure 14.1 caption.
Updated history.present_illness to specify 'left hemisphere' TIA, consistent with right-sided motor symptoms and Figure 14.1 caption.

patch_ops.value: 2 to 3 days following a left hemisphere transient ischemic attack (TIA).

Patient experienced a left hemisphere TIA (weakness, numbness, loss of motor control on right side) while exercising. 2-3 days later, began hearing constant music (familiar songs like 'Take Me Out to the Ball Game', 'Silent Night') in the right ear. He can change the song by thinking of another one. The music is less noticeable in background noise.
